mapper.select: select id, first, second, third, fourth, fifth from scs2.main_menu where id=#{db}
mapper.update: update scs2.main_menu set first=#{mainMenuVo.first}, second=#{mainMenuVo.second}, third=#{mainMenuVo.third}, fourth=#{mainMenuVo.fourth}, fifth=#{mainMenuVo.fifth} where id=#{db}
mapper.select: select no, menu_index as menuIndex, name, id, state from scs2.sub_menu where id=#{db} and state=true order by menu_index
select no, custom_index as customIndex, design_id as designId, menu_no as menuNo from scs2.custom where menu_no=#{no}

select b.no, b.custom_no as customNo, b.contents_index as 'index', b.content, a.design_id as designId, a.custom_index as customIndex from scs2.custom a, scs2.contents b where a.no = b.custom_no and b.custom_no = #{no} order by b.contents_index
mapper.delete: delete from scs2.contents where custom_no=#{customNo} and contents_index>#{index}
mapper.select: select count(*) from scs2.contents where custom_no=#{customNo}
